column3: Please, don't create manual backport PRs for trivial things that can be cherry-picked automatically. Adding a "Needs backport" tag should be enough, they will be included and collected in backport PRs.

> Please, don't create manual backport PRs for trivial things that can be cherry-picked automatically. Adding a "Needs backport" tag should be enough, they will be included and collected in backport PRs.\n\n@laanwj OK, thank you, I did not know the process.
No problem for this time! just that, if everyone does this for everything you'd get a blow up (N branches * N PRs). So it's something to reserve for non-trivial backports, in general :smile:
